sec.p: Interfacing provides collaborative business process management systems and tools that enable business users to model, map and manage business processes and related knowledge. Their product line includes a Free Visio BPMN Modeler plugin, a process simulation tool, and an Enterprise-wide business process management suite.

Free Visio BPMN Modeler: Released in early 2008, this free plugin for
Microsoft
Visio provides specific features to aid modelers in the creation of BPMN process flowcharts.

Designer: This award-winning process simulation tool allows consultants to construct detailed what-if scenarios in order to provide feedback to process designers. The processes modeled in Interfacing's designer can be run for simulation over time to conduct process analysis.

Enterprise Process Center (EPC): The Enterprise Process Center (EPC) is a multi-user Business Process Management suite. The EPC includes modules for a complete process repository, organizational management, company documentation, enterprise risk management, business rules, business metadata, web services, and corporate audits. Featuring a Business Intelligence module, powered by
Cognos .2
